content:
Hi, I’m Mikalai - a Senior Software Engineer from Belarus with the Master Degree in Computer Science and 14 years in Software Engineering. I’ve worked both for big companies (EPAM, Ness) and for local product startups (Facemetrics, The Intro). In the past I participated in mentoring of developers inside the company and as an external contractor.
In my free time I get carried away with aviation photography (aviaspotting) - please check my photo portfolio
Reach me out in LinkedIn or by email
summary: Hi, I’m Mikalai - a Senior Software Engineer from Belarus with the Master Degree in Computer Science and 14 years in Software Engineering. I’ve worked both for big companies (EPAM, Ness) and for local product startups (Facemetrics, The Intro).
title: Mikalai Hrytsuk
